#Challenge 2

What is age and mass? 

```{r}
mass <- 47.5
age <- 122
mass <- mass * 2.3
age <- age - 20
```

#Challenge 3

Run the code from the previous challenge, and write a command to compare mass to age. Is mass larger than age?

```{r}
mass > age

```
